long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A minimal Stack Overflow theme that utilizes JavaScript and CSS to alter the user browser’s styling and layout. 

This theme removed the sidebars and ads to simply show the answers to the questions you are looking for.

It also highlights the answer with the most upvotes in a green text box.
